mit neuen Variabeln ergibt sich :><
Wellengel. :(\(\frac{\partial^2}{\partial t^2} - \alpha^2 \frac{\partial^2}{\partial x^2}\)) u(x,t) = 0
AB :u(x,0) = f(x)
\(\frac{\partial u(x,0)}{\partial t} = q(x)\)
mit neuen Variabeln ergibt sich :
u(x,0) = u(x(r,s), t(r,s)) = y(r,s)
\(\frac{\partial u(x,r)}{\partial t} = \frac{\partial y}{\partial t} \cdot \frac{\partial r}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial y}{\partial s} \cdot \frac{\partial s}{\partial t}\)
\(\frac{\partial^2 u(x,r)}{\partial t^2} = \frac{\partial}{\partial t} (\frac{\partial u(x,r)}{\partial t}) = \frac{\partial}{\partial t} (\alpha (\frac{\partial y}{\partial t} - \frac{\partial y}{\partial s}))\)
= \(\alpha [\frac{\partial y}{\partial t} \frac{\partial y}{\partial t} - \frac{\partial y}{\partial s} \frac{\partial y}{\partial s}]\)
= \(\alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial t} (\frac{\partial y}{\partial t} \frac{\partial y}{\partial t} + \frac{\partial y}{\partial s} \frac{\partial y}{\partial s}) - \alpha \frac{\partial}{\partial s} (\frac{\partial y}{\partial t} \frac{\partial y}{\partial t} - \partial y \frac{\partial y}{\partial s})\)
= \(\alpha^2 (\frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial t^2} - 2 \frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial t \partial s} + \frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial s^2})\)
analog für \(\frac{\partial^2 u(x,t)}{\partial x^2}\) :
analog für \(\frac{\partial^2 u(x,t)}{\partial x^2}\) :
\(\frac{\partial^2 u(x,t)}{\partial x^2} = \frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial t^2} + 2 \frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial t \partial s} + \frac{2 \partial^2 y}{\partial s^2}\)		\(\frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial t^2} - 2 \frac{\partial y}{\partial t \partial s} + \frac{\partial^2 y}{\partial s^{2}}\)
